p: The botanical identification of specimens was performed at the herbarium of the “Universidad Nacional de Loja” by Dr. Bolivar Merino. A voucher specimen number PPN-pi-010 is preserved in the Herbarium of the Universidad Técnica Particular de Loja. The method AOAC 930.04-1930, Loss on drying (Moisture) in plants, was used to determine the moisture of plant material.
